mapper.select: select * from user where userName = #{name} or userNickName = #{name}
select authority from authorities where email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, email, password, userName, userNickname, gender, accountStatus, createTime) values (#{id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{gender}, #{accountStatus}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update user set email=#{email}, password=#{password}, userName=#{userName}, userNickname=#{userNickname}, gender=#{gender}, accountStatus=#{accountStatus} where id = #{id}
